ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectInterim Order Modifying the Operation of the Passenger Automobile and Light Truck Greenhouse Gas Emission Regulations
PrecisINTERIM ORDER MODIFYING THE OPERATION OF THE PASSENGER AUTOMOBILE AND LIGHT TRUCK GREENHOUSE GAS EMISSION REGULATIONS in order to maintain alignment of Canadaâ€™s regulations with those of the United States with respect to the treatment of emergency vehicles and the options for complying with the emission standards for nitrous oxide and methane.
